CustomField.formula: AND( wrts_prcgvr__IsClosed__c = False, OR( AND( OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HDT_RT_Default', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HDT_RT_AttivitaGestionali'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type__c,'Validazione Documentale')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type__c,'Validazione Vocal Order')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type__c,'Documenti non validati')) ), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HDT_RT_Scarto', ISPICKVAL( DiscardCategory__c,'Manuale') ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HDT_RT_HCPoint', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HDT_RT_Sportello', Contains( RecordType.DeveloperName ,'Escalation'), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HDT_RT_RegisterActivity', ISPICKVAL( DiscardCategory__c,'Gestionale'), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HDT_RT_DistributorCommunication' ) )
CustomField.label: Mostra Completa Attivit√†
